section7_title_2: The indexing industry has come a long way over the past 100 years. BeQ Holdings' offers are “smart”, sophisticated and innovative to respond to the very changing conditions of the market and the requirements of investors

section9_title: We help our customers to achieve mutual goals
section9_des_1: Extensive experience and expertise in financial markets and investment strategies, capital and smart business models have made BeQ Holdings the trusted partner for organizations and individuals looking to maximize profits while minimizing risks in a volatile and challenging context.
section9_des_2: BeQ Holdings with over 40 years of experience understands big data, data science, data analytics, financial markets and business intelligence to help you make informed investment decisions
section9_des_3: BeQ Holdings has built a reputation as a trusted advisor to investment funds, financial institutions, angel investors, venture capital funds, investment banks, and individual investors , businesses as well as researchers globally.
section9_des_4: Our experts of experts understand that data is valuable only when correctly analyzed and interpreted, and with the tools and expertise we help our clients make sense of their data and transform it that data into useful insights, into valuable assets.
section10_des: BeQ Holdings has inherited the achievement of calculating 22,889 indexes (Vietnam and International) from IFRC – essential for investors who want to make informed decisions about their investment portfolio.
